mdWarning.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.EntityNotChildOfMainWarning
mdWarning.label: Entity Not Child of Main Warning
mdWarning.description: Thrown when an entity is not a located_in child of any main geo entity.
mdWarning.message: The following geo entities are not located_in any main geo entities: [{entities}].

text.name: entities
text.label: entities
text.description: List of entities that violated the located_in restriction.

mdMethod.name: isChildOfParents
mdMethod.label: Is Child Of Parents
mdMethod.description: Checks if the given entities are children of the parent entities.
